Sentencas: CeO2 doped with lower valence cations, such as Y3+, Sm3+, Gd3+, etc., is considered as electrolyte material for low temperature solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Conductivity enhancement of yttria doped ceria by spark plasma and ac assisted sintering methods

Sentencas: Doping introduces additional oxygen vacancies and improves ionic conductivity.
Titulo: Conductivity enhancement of yttria doped ceria by spark plasma and ac assisted sintering methods

Sentencas: This work describes the preparation of yttria-calcia doped ceria precursor material, its sintering in DC and AC field methods, and characterisation of sintered electrolytes with respect to the ionic conductivity.
Titulo: Conductivity enhancement of yttria doped ceria by spark plasma and ac assisted sintering methods

Sentencas: Doped precursor materials were prepared by a controlled co-precipitation process.
Titulo: Conductivity enhancement of yttria doped ceria by spark plasma and ac assisted sintering methods

Sentencas: Sintering of prepared, pelletised particulates was carried out using three different methods such as: conventional, spark plasma sintering, and an alternating current field at 1125 degrees C (AC assisted sintering).
Titulo: Conductivity enhancement of yttria doped ceria by spark plasma and ac assisted sintering methods

Sentencas: The conductivity was determined as a function of defect density, grain boundary area and phase stability.
Titulo: Conductivity enhancement of yttria doped ceria by spark plasma and ac assisted sintering methods

Sentencas: It was found that the applied field during sintering, either via pulsed DC (spark plasma), or AC, produced marginal effects on yttria doped ceria microstructure.
Titulo: Conductivity enhancement of yttria doped ceria by spark plasma and ac assisted sintering methods

Sentencas: However, it should be noted that because the sintering conditions were not optimised there is room for substantial conductivity improvements.
Titulo: Conductivity enhancement of yttria doped ceria by spark plasma and ac assisted sintering methods
